title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the simulation model, user interface, data sources, and desired features.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the simulation engine, data management, user interface components, and integration with external data sources. Consider scalability, performance, and maintainability requirements. Define the high-level components, their interactions, and the technology stack to be used.

title: Develop Simulation Engine
description: Implement the core simulation engine that models cultural and societal evolution based on various factors and algorithms.

title: Build Data Management System
description: Design and implement the data management system for storing and retrieving simulation data, historical data, and user-generated scenarios.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for interacting with the simulation, visualizing results, and configuring scenarios.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Design and implement security measures, including user authentication, authorization, and data encryption.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application to various environments.

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including user guides, API documentation, and developer documentation.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute various testing strategies, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing.
